arguments.input_description: The image shows handwritten text saying "Draw an X in the box." and below it there is a hand-drawn square box.
arguments.output_description: Drawing an X inside the square box using two intersecting diagonal lines.
arguments.svg:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1404" height="1872">
  <path d="M 600 400 L 800 600 M 800 400 L 600 600" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
</svg>
